title: LARGE 2BR 2BA UTILITIES INCLUDED!
posting_body: ['CHECK OUT THIS LARGE AND BRIGHT APARTMENT FOR ONLY $1360/MO:', '- SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOMS WITH 2 BATHROOMS', '- WALK IN CLOSET AND BALCONY', '- NEWLY UPDATED KITCHEN CABNETS', '- COIN LAUNDRY IN BUILDING', '- OFF STREET PARKING IS AVAILABLE', '- GREAT LOCATION: 1 MILE TO LOYOLA UNIVERSITY, 5 MINUTES WALKING DISTANCE TO CTA RED  LINE STATION, LESS TAHN 10 MIN WALK TO LAKE MICHIGAN BEACH', '- GAS, WATER AND HEAT INCLUDED (YOU PAY ONLY FOR ELECTRICITY)!', 'The application fee for background/credit history check is required.', 'Photos are not available as the apartment is currently updating to be ready for a new tenant which will be done in a few days.', 'But you can schedule viewing already.', 'Feel free to contact for any questions or make an appointment to see the apartment.', "This opportunity won't last!"]
